channel.title: How do I edit a monster's "stats"?
channel.description:
Right now me and my friend are trying to edit the corporal beast; we have set his hp at 50k, but we want him to be able to hit higher (around 40 or so, his max is currently about 15).
Does anyone know where I can find his max hit, per say?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: How do I edit a monster's "stats"?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Craddock Mod Craddock
item.description:
@Mod_Craddock wrote:

I don’t exactly know where to add it though; I’ve edited a few things in the file, which haven’t seemed to change his max hit at all (still about a 1/4 chance of hitting a 15, rest are 0’s). I edited hitdifference or something, if i remember correctly…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I edit a monster's "stats"?

item.title: How do I edit a monster's "stats"?
item.dc:creator: @Nullz Nullz
item.description:
@Nullz wrote:

this would be in NPChandler.

Read full topic
